00067 void z2Pos::_validate(bool for_real)
00068 {
00069         copy_info();
00070 
00071         set_out_channels( Mask_All );
00072         
00073 
00074         info_.set( info_.x(), info_.y(), info_.r(), info_.t() );
00075         Format temp = info_.format();
00076 
00077         width = temp.width();
00078         height = temp.height();
00079 }

00081 void z2Pos::_request(int x,int y,int r,int t, ChannelMask channels, int count)
00082 {
00083         input0().request(x,y,r,t, channels, count);
00084 }
00085 
00086 void z2Pos::engine(int y, int x, int r, ChannelMask channels, Row& out)
00087 {
00089         out.range(0, width);
00091         Row in1(x, r);
00092 
00093         input0().get(y, x, r, channels, in1);
00095         foreach (z, channels) 
00096         {
00098                 float* outPixelsR = out.writable(Chan_Red);
00099                 float* outPixelsG = out.writable(Chan_Green);
00100                 float* outPixelsB = out.writable(Chan_Blue);
00101 
00102 
00103                 float fovPrepX = sin( fov / 2 );
00104                 float fovStepX = fovPrepX * 2 / (float)width;
00105 
00106                 float fovPrepY = sin( fov / 2 ) * (float)width / (float)height;
00107                 float fovStepY = fovPrepY * 2 / (float)height;
00109                 for (int index = x; index < r; index++ ) 
00110                 {
00112                         float depth = in1[Chan_Red][index];
00114                         float xValue = fovPrepX - index * fovStepX;
00116                         float yValue = fovPrepY - y * fovStepY;
00118                         outPixelsR[index] = depth * xValue;
00119                         outPixelsG[index] = depth * yValue;
00120                         outPixelsB[index] = depth;
00121                 }
00122         }
00123 
00124 }
